headline: Crypto competition heats up, Kraken launches new payment app
summary: The crypto industry had a strong start to the year, as bitcoin (BTC-USD), shares of Coinbase (COIN), and Robinhood (HOOD) soared in the second quarter. As competition heats up, Kraken announced it's launching a new peer-to-peer payment app. Kraken (KRAK.PVT) Co-CEO Arjun Sethi joined Ramzan Karmali, explaining why this app will bring in a larger audience to the crypto space. Sethi also addressed the company's IPO plans saying, "If we think about going public, regardless of the timeline, it's gonna be in essence to be able to show continued transparency, and that that is in the best interest of our clients and our customers." To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise here
